title: Castles in the Sand
description: Castles in the Sand is a character-driven story of loss and redemption, of family and love. Thirty-eight-year-old Justin Wentworth's entitled lifestyle slams into a collapsing economy. Alcoholic and living on the streets of Vancouver, he longs to regain the love of his wife and little boy. Hope appears when Good Samaritan Steve Jameson rescues the mugged Justin from a dumpster and gives food and shelter in return for Justin's story. Justin tells all but begins to mistrust Steve. Will Justin find his way back to his family or are darker forces at work against him?
author: Annie Daylon
